text:
*Just 3 weeks left of our pilot programme* <!channel> 
:scream::scream::scream:
With only 3 weeks left of this pilot e-mentoring programme, we want to make some real headway with the mentee career plans so they have something they can refer to long after our pilot study finishes!

:point_right:*Your challenge for this week* is to help your mentee complete the 1st section of their career plan by 5pm Friday. It's a great way to tease out all the questions cooped up in their minds using the different headers & question prompts. But also point them in the direction of the *tools and resources* we have hand picked for them and - of course - share your own favourite resources and links (TED talks, articles, inspiring stories/quotes that have motivated you!). Part of being a mentor is guiding students to sources relevant to them amidst the sometimes overwhelming plethora of information out there!  

So get to it! :muscle::muscle::muscle:
